title: Capabilities Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Capabilities domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name or title of the Capability

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Capability entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Capability within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Capability

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Capability is linked

inputs.description: The resources, information, or materials required for the Capability to function

outputs.description: The deliverables or results produced by the Capability

processes.description: The set of processes that define how the Capability operates

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the effectiveness and efficiency of the Capability

dependencies.description: Other capabilities, processes, or systems that the Capability depends on

relatedCapabilities.description: Capabilities that are related or linked to this Capability

maturityLevel.description: The current maturity level of the Capability

toolsAndTechnologies.description: Tools and technologies used to support or enable the Capability

complianceAndStandards.description: Regulatory requirements and standards the Capability must adhere to

cost.description: The financial cost associated with implementing and maintaining the Capability

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Capability and its operations

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Capability can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Capability aligns with the Organizations strategic goals and objectives

parent.description: A high-level Capability that encompasses multiple sub-capabilities or child capabilities

child.description: A specific Capability that falls under a broader parent Capability

childProcess.description: A detailed process that supports a child Capability

title.description: The name or title of the function

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the function involves

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the activity

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the function

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) where the function resides

inputs.description: The inputs required to perform the function

outputs.description: The outputs or deliverables produced by the function

processes.description: The processes involved in the function

capabilityComponent.description: The components that make up the Capability

title.description: The name or title of the Capability component

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Capability component involves

purpose.description: The intended purpose or benefit of the Capability component

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Capability component

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) utilizing the Capability component

technologies.description: The technologies and tools used for the Capability component

processes.description: The processes involved in the Capability component

skills.description: The skills and competencies required for the Capability component

title.description: The name or title of the Process

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Process entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Process

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Process

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) where the Process resides

inputs.description: The inputs required to perform the Process

outputs.description: The outputs or deliverables produced by the Process

steps.description: Detailed steps involved in the Process

performanceMetrics.description: Metrics used to measure Process effectiveness

toolsRequired.description: Tools and equipment needed for the Process
